channel.title: [PI] A few problems
channel.description:
Okay guys I have a few problems with my server: 1. Most of my skills are written wrong. 2. A Custom item I am trying to create needs a LITTLE tweaking. 3. One of my teleportation spells disconnects you from server. 4. Using a smelting object gives the Client some errors and disconnects. 5. One of my Staff Ranks crown isn't working in speech.
These are just top of my head problems. PM me if you would like to try and help over TeamViewer, or comment only if you'd know how to solve one of these problems. (Except for 3&5 you would HAVE to see it over TV to understand.)
P.S. I am generous with Donating for players helping me.

item.title: [PI] A few problems
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vein Da Vein
item.description:
@Da_Vein wrote:

Okay guys I have a few problems with my server:

  1. Most of my skills are written wrong.
  2. A Custom item I am trying to create needs a LITTLE tweaking.
  3. One of my teleportation spells disconnects you from server.
  4. Using a smelting object gives the Client some errors and disconnects.
  5. One of my Staff Ranks crown isn’t working in speech.

These are just top of my head problems. PM me if you would like to try and help over TeamViewer, or comment only if you’d know how to solve one of these problems. (Except for 3&5 you would HAVE to see it over TV to understand.)

P.S. I am generous with Donating for players helping me.
